Comment.val:
General remark ============ If the oder by / sort of BTPC rows has to be changed in BXA003, also the order by / sort of BTPC rows in BXA052 has to be changed. Both programs always have to use the same order by!!!
DO NOT REMOVE THIS VERSION OF BXA003 FORM PROGRAM REPOSITORY ADN DO NOT MOVE TO THE BACKUP FOLDERS UNTIL IT IS CLEAR THAT THIS VERSION WILL BE NEVER USED.
@ History ============================================== 03.05.2006 SH SCR 11092 This version of BXA003 included the sort of BTPC rows with debtor fields and the special creation XML of subtotals on BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP. This version is used in countries where GNRL_CODE <> NL.

Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
@Before changing the sort/order by of BTPC, read comments (F10)@
@This is the special version of BXA003, see SCR6266 and read comments(F10)@
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
08.05.2011 GB SCR16396 Changed condition for call part Promissory notes / Cheque
29.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
11.10.2007 SH SCR12961 BXA003G Added writing of ATXL if GNRL_CODE= 'RO'
09.08.2007 SH SCR12775 If PI.BTCH_ID > 0 then COUT variables have not to be
passed as parameters to BXA900
03.05.2006 SH SCR11092 Changed remarks, see above
02.03.2006 SH SCR10529 BXA003B Added test to write 3. description only once
per change on BTCP level
01.03.2006 SH SCR10520 BXA003B Extended <reason> with 5. description
20.01.2006 SH SCR10164 Replaced DEBC_DEBC_SORT by BTPC_DEBC_DEBC_SORT
17.01.2006 SH SCR9736 Moved DEBC_DEBC_SORT in sort below BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP
12.01.2006 SH SCR10053 BXA003E Added sort on Date
10.01.2006 SH SCR10080 BXA003B Extended <reason> with 4. description
10.01.2006 SH SCR10053 BXA003E Added new tags <sum_cc>, <sum_paid> and
22.12.2005 SH Changed "Status" to OK, see line 3 and renamed BXA003_DEV to
12.12.2005 SH SCR9738 Extended sequnece of selection with DEBC_DEBC_SORT and
added two ne tags to BXA003B <invoice_amount_fact_cc > and
<invoice_amount_spec_cc >
25.05.2005 SH SCR8369 Extended variable for tanslations of DEBH_HADR_NAME1
from alpha 70 to alpha 80
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles

-- uses for errorhandling
-- uses for triggering
... only if BTPC/BPIV were selected and temp XML file were produced, the further
XML handling, see T.S. has to be performed
-- uses to switch back to user language, report has to be created in client lang
-- Report has to be printed in client language, therefore store user language to
switch back at the end of BXA003
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
Build FileNames for Tempfiles
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch to client language, in which the report has to be produced
-- Switch back to user language
-- Only if BTPC/BPIV rows were detected and temp XML were produced
-- Build final XML File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- This temp XML file has to be deleted always, because the I/O file was created
also if no BTPC/BPIV exists for the report (see child task)
-- Fetch debtor country code and city
-- Fetch debtor name of buying group
-- Totals which have to be written to XML in BXA003D/BXA003F
@ Triggers to avoid multiple writing of BTCP/BTPC fields, in a <debtor> part
(The third description has to be only updated and written to XML for each
BTCP row and not for every BPIV row, also some fields in the
<transaction> part have to only written once)
-- Uses as trigger to close <group> for buying groups in G.S. BTPC_DEBHBUYGROUP
-- Prepare text to use in report
-- Only if BTPC rows were detected
-- Write XML Header
-- Calculate totals and write them to XML
... on BTPC_DATVALUECLEINT
... on BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT
... general total
... on BPIV_PAYMENTCODE
... last line only if GNRL_CODE ='DE' (see R.P. where trigger initialized)
... last line only if GNRL_CODE ='RO' (see R.P. where trigger initialized)
-- Moved invoices --> write <group> '*** MOVED TO OTHER DEBTOR ***'
-- Booked off --> write <group> '*** BOOKED OFF ***'
-- Open buying group only if BTPC_BATCH_CODE <> GNRL_BATCHIDBOOKEDOFF
and <> GNRL_BATCHIDMOVEDINVOICES
-- Prepare DEBH_BUYGROUPMNAME
-- If buying group then write <group> to indicate that all following debtor part
are members of this buying group (trigger by SORT and GROUP)
-- If buying group then write </group> to close buying group part
-- Reset trigger
-- Prepare BTPC_DEBH_HADR_NAME1, BTPC_DEBH_HADR_CITY
-- Prepare BTPC_DEBC_DEBC
-- Set variables
@ Trigger to avoid multiple writing of BTCP fields, in a <debtor> part
-- Set variables
@ Trigger to avoid multiple writing of BTPC fields, in a <debtor> part
-- Prepare totals on BTPC level
... uses in BXA003D
... uses in BXA003F
-- Start debtor part <debtor>
-- Close debtor part </debtor>
-- Reset variables
-- Prepare BPIV_INVO_INVOICENO
-- Trigger to perform further XML handling, see T.S. and parent task
-- Special test to write text to the end of report
... GNRL_CODE ='DE'
... GNRL_CODE ='RO'
-- Prepare descriptions, max. 5 descriptions possible, which have to be written
into separate <transaction> parts, also max. 5 possible for each BPIV row
@If one of the following descriptions = blank, the next description has to be
used which is <> blank, to avoid writing of empty <reason> tags
... 1. Description
... 2. Description
-- 3. Description (only once per BTCP, not for every BPIV row)
... 3. Description
-- 4. and 5. Description (only once per BTPC, not for every BPIV row)
... 4. Description
... 5. Description
-- Prepare totals on BPIV level (uses in BXA003D)
-- Write <transaction> part to XML
-- Store actual fetched BTPC_LINENO, uses to write BTPC fields only once to
report, not for every fetched BPIV row, see task "Write <transaction>"
-- Reset trigger to avoid multiple writing of BTCP/BTPC fields, in a <debtor>
part

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Payment by cheque subject to approval')
MlsTrans ('Payment by cheque subject to apporval')

Text.val: -- Details (because of multiple descritions, see above, the <transaction> part
has to be performed for each possible description)
... 1. transaction part always, for every selected BPIV row
... 2. transaction part only if a 2. or 3. or 4. or 5. description exists
... 3. transaction part only if a 3. or 4. or 5. description exists
... 4. transaction part only if a 4. or 5. description exists
... 5. transaction part only if a 5. description exists

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT, cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTAFACTORING) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTASPECIAL) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTARETENTION) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTADISPUTES) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal (18,2)), cast (sum (BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (18,2)) from :1/BTPC where BTPC_ADMNO=:2 and BTPC_CLNTNO=:3 and BTPC_STATUS=3 :4 group by BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT order by BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT for fetch only

Text.val: -- Calculate totals v.TotalAmountCC
-- Calculate totals v.TotalAmountDeduction

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (18,2)) from :1/btpc, :1/bpiv where BTPC_ADMNO=:2 and BTPC_CLNTNO=:3 and BTPC_STATUS=3 and BPIV_BTCH_ID = BTPC_BTCH_ID and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = BTPC_BTCP_LINENO and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = BTPC_LINENO and BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT = ':4' :5 and :6 for fetch only

select BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT, cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTAFACTORING) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTASPECIAL) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTARETENTION) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTADISPUTES) as decimal (18,2)), cast ( sum (BTPC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal (18,2)), cast (sum (BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (18,2)) from :1/BTPC, :1/BTCP where BTPC_ADMNO=:2 and BTPC_CLNTNO=:3 and BTPC_STATUS=3 :4 and BTPC_BTCH_ID=BTCP_BTCH_ID and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO=BTCP_LINENO group by BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT order by BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT

Text.val: -- Calculate totals v.TotalAmountCC
-- Calculate totals v.TotalAmountDeduction

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (18,2)) from :1/btcp, :1/btpc, :1/bpiv where BTPC_ADMNO=:2 and BTPC_CLNTNO=:3 and BTPC_STATUS=3 and BTPC_BTCH_ID=BTCP_BTCH_ID and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO=BTCP_LINENO and BPIV_BTCH_ID = BTPC_BTCH_ID and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = BTPC_BTCP_LINENO and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = BTPC_LINENO and BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT = ':4' :5 and :6 for fetch only

select BPIV_PAYMENTCODE, cast ( sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (18,2)) from :1/BTPC, :1/BPIV where BTPC_ADMNO=:2 and BTPC_CLNTNO=:3 and BTPC_STATUS=3 :4 and BTPC_BTCH_ID=BPIV_BTCH_ID and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO=BPIV_BTCP_LINENO and BTPC_LINENO=BPIV_BTPC_LINENO and BPIV_LEDG_NO=0 and BPIV_PAYMENTCODE>0 and BPIV_INVO_NO=0 group by BPIV_PAYMENTCODE order by BPIV_PAYMENTCODE

Text.val: -- Calculate total which has to written to XML in T.S.
-- Get description for payment code

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('WIR WEISEN AUF EINE EVTL. MELDEPFLICHT GEM. PARAGR. 59FF DER AWV HIN.')
